title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, I would like to understand what the message means.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant). 
2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy. 
3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
